title: Diskar Til Sölu
text:
Ef þið hafið áhuga á einhvern af þessum diskum, þá bara að senda mér skilaboð hér á huga.
Quensbridge Finest - QB Finest
DMX - Year of the Dog Again
Tony Yayo - Thoughts of a Predicate Felon
Westside Connection - Terrorist Threats
Field Mob - Light Poles and Pine Trees
The Game - Doctor's Advocate
Gravediggaz - The Pich, The Sickle and the Shovel
Cam'Ron - Purple Haze
Eminem Presents The RE-UP - The RE-UP
DJ Muggs - Dust
Cypress Hill - Stones Raiders
Young Buck - Straight Outta Cashville
North Star - North Star
Mase - Double Up
Snoop Dogg - Da Game Is To Be Sold, Not To Be Told
Pastor Troy - Universal Soldier
The Mitchell Brothers - A Breath Of Fresh Attire
